welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Franklin Farm, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily international flights and offers duty-free shopping and dining options.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights and offers a variety of shops and restaurants for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily domestic flights and offers a variety of shops and restaurants for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'IAD Free WiFi' network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves as a hub for several major airlines, with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport is the largest terminal, serving a wide range of domestic and international flights with a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'DCA Free WiFi' network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all commercial flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the airport also has a dedicated terminal with luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
